summary:
OUR VISION - Boomer on ethereum is committed to onboarding 10,000,000+ users to Ethereum network through education, community and empowerment.

 TOKEN - Boomer is a cryptocurrency on the Ethereum network with its contract now renounced for greater decentralization and a tax rate of 0%, ensuring no additional fees on transactions. The initial liquidity has been burned, enhancing the security and potential value of boomer tokens.

 LEARN - We offer a series of engaging videos tailored to help boomers understand the ins and outs of cryptocurrency. As a community dedicated to education, we break down complex crypto concepts into clear, accessible information. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to deepen your knowledge, our resources are designed to empower you on your crypto journey.
